arts.ttl: Serie A leader Napoli beats Lecce amid flares and delays to go 6 points clear of Inter
arts.sum: Giacomo Raspadori scored the only goal to send Napoli six points clear of second-placed Inter Milan, which was playing lowly Hellas Verona later. Lecce reacted well and Kialonda Gaspar headed a corner onto the crossbar but, despite laying siege to the goal, it couldnâ€™t find the equalizer and remained just a point above the relegation zone.
